titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an Walter Morley Fletcher, 14. 2. 1914
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der Trinity College Library; Kopie im BA.

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: A few daies ago I received the enclosed note & I think it must have been sent to me by mistake as Mr Russell has paied my College bill some daies before the note was made out. I hope the mater shall be settled when you get this. If not, would you kindly let me know.
